terms.definition: Bromance is the combination of two words, `brother` and `romance`. It describes the unique male bonding found between `brothers from another mother`. This is between heterosexual males and no matter what is never seen as a gay relationship, though it may be joked about
terms.example: Javiar and Kevin have such a bromance, they literally know what the others thinking.

terms.definition: To consume an obsene amount of meat resulting in perfuse sweating.
terms.example: They needed to mop thier brow as they had a bad case of the meat sweats.

terms.definition: Using a companies computer and Internet for personal activities when one should be doing work.
terms.example: John's job is so boring and monotonous that he started Cyberslacking by browsing Youtube for hours everyday.

terms.definition: Someone who asks for your advice but then, does the exact opposite.
terms.example: Most of my friends are askholes.

terms.definition: A psycho who goes into girls bedrooms to watch them sleep. May or may not sparkle.
terms.example: This guy is a total Edward Cullen! Crept into my room again last night!

terms.definition: The science of figuring out the distance between the movie theater screen and speakers to ensure an optimal movie-watching experience.
terms.example: Mason insisted on going to the theater early and finding the perfect seat; he wanted to show his date how movie theater physics works

terms.definition: Obnoxious eater - someone who eats really loud, aggressive and offensive and is unpleasant to be around.
terms.example: I was at the movie theatre and was sitting beside a noxter, I almost got up and left it was so annoying.

terms.definition: Texting, eating and watching TV with an open textbook nearby
Little monsters that sneak into your room at night and sew all your clothes tighter.
